new_project.title: New Project
new_project.fsa_desc: Create a deterministic or non-deterministic automaton with finite states. Capable of representing regular grammars.
new_project.pda_desc: Create an automaton with a push-down stack capable of representing context-free grammars.
new_project.tm_desc: Create a turing machine capable of representing recursively enumerable grammars.

examples.title: Automata Examples
examples.fsa_desc: Follow an in-tour tutorial on how to build a finite state automaton.
examples.pda_desc: Follow an in-tour tutorial on how to build a push-down stack.
examples.tm_desc: Follow an in-tour tutorial on how to build a turing machine.

create.title: Create New Module
create.description: Modules are interactive questions that will help assess your understanding of automata.

delete_dialog.title: Delete Project?
delete_dialog.description: This will permanently remove your project {{projectName}} from your computer.
